definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: All that is required is a valve .
sentences.chinese: 全部所需的就只是一個活門。

sentences.english: Replaced nose gear shock strut charging valve, no leakage in GND check.
sentences.chinese: 更換前起落架減振支柱充氣活門，地面檢查無滲漏。

sentences.english: A drain valve is located on the bottom of the tank.
sentences.chinese: 一個排放活門被安裝在水箱底部。

sentences.english: He can open and close the door with negligible work.
sentences.chinese: 他可以控制活門的開關而做的功則可以忽略不計。

sentences.english: Disconnect the air pressure source from the air valve at the water service panel.
sentences.chinese: 從水勤務面板空氣活門斷開空氣壓力源。
